decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up a powerful creature by attaching a bunch of auras to it. The deck uses creatures with hexproof, like Silhana Ledgewalker and Slippery Bogle, to ensure that the opponent can't easily remove or target the enchanted creature. It also includes various aura enchantments like Rancor, Ethereal Armor, Armadillo Cloak, and Ancestral Mask to boost the enchanted creature's power and toughness. The deck also includes some card draw and mana ramp cards to help maintain a steady flow of auras and mana.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive, fast-paced gameplay using low-cost creatures and burn spells. It focuses on efficiently dealing damage to the opponent's life total while also making use of artifact synergies. The deck aims to maintain a steady flow of damage through creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Voldaren Epicure, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast. Additionally, it makes use of cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Goblin Bushwhacker to quickly generate a wide board presence and push through damage.

This deck focuses on an aggressive playstyle and relies heavily on the affinity mechanic. It includes low-cost artifacts like Ornithopter and Gingerbrute along with cards that generate extra artifacts like Springleaf Drum and Glint Hawk. The deck also includes powerful artifact creatures like Myr Enforcer and Frogmite, which can be played for reduced mana cost due to the affinity mechanic. The deck aims to flood the board with artifacts and overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and direct damage spells like Galvanic Blast.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. It relies on low-cost creatures such as Monastery Swiftspear and Goblin Bushwhacker to deal damage early on, while Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast provide direct damage spells to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes artifact cards like Implement of Combustion and Experimental Synthesizer to generate additional value and mana. The deck's strategy is to maintain a fast pace and pressure the opponent with a combination of creatures and burn spells.

The core idea of this deck is to utilize control tactics with the Dimir color combination. The main focus is on disrupting the opponent's plans and removing threats through cards like Counterspell, Agony Warp, and Snuff Out. The deck aims to draw additional cards and generate card advantage with spells like Thought Scour, Mental Note, and Brainstorm. Lórien Revealed and Fallaji Archaeologist provide added utility and potential for recursion. The deck also includes efficient creatures like Gurmag Angler for threat presence. Additionally, the deck includes utility lands like Tolarian Terror and Contaminated Aquifer for added versatility.

The deck is focused on control and utilizing gates as a key component. It includes various control cards like Counterspell and Journey to Nowhere to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The gates, such as Azorius Guildgate and Basilisk Gate, provide mana fixing and allow for the activation of additional abilities. The deck also includes a mix of creatures like Squadron Hawk and Guardian of the Guildpact to provide board presence and protect against specific types of threats. The goal of the deck is to maintain control over the game while utilizing the benefits of gates to gain an advantage.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively apply pressure to the opponent using low-cost creatures and spells, while also having the ability to control the board through removal and protection spells. The deck utilizes cards like Lightning Bolt, Cleansing Wildfire, and Journey to Nowhere to remove threats, while also having access to Prismatic Strands for protection. It also aims to gain card advantage through Faithless Looting and Ephemerate, while having late-game threats like Stonehorn Dignitary and Palace Sentinels to maintain control. Overall, the deck combines aggression, removal, and protection to dominate the game.

The key concept of this deck is to apply aggressive pressure on the opponent using a mono-black strategy. The deck includes a mix of removal spells like Chainer's Edict, Cast Down, and Deadly Dispute to control the board and eliminate threats. It also focuses on card advantage with cards like Reckoner's Bargain, Ichor Wellspring, and Tithing Blade to maintain a steady stream of resources. The deck utilizes powerful creatures like Gray Merchant of Asphodel, Thorn of the Black Rose, Troll of Khazad-dûm, and Crypt Rats to deal damage and gain life. Finally, it includes some land cards like Bojuka Bog, Golgari Rot Farm, and Witch's Cottage for additional utility.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive red spells and creatures. It relies on low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Voldaren Epicure, as well as burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, to quickly bring down the opponent's life total. The deck also focuses on generating creatures through cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Goblin Tomb Raider. It aims to maintain a high tempo by efficiently using resources and maintaining a steady flow of damage.
